meanings: (관용)as (was[had been]) expected,It should be so.,I thought so!

vlive.korean: 그냥 예를 들어서 그렇... 제가 그걸 한다는... It was just an example... For me to do it... 듣기 View video V PICK! : [YOO SEONHO] 앞으로 많은 얘기가 필요할 것 같은 서노의 상탈 후 봄이오면..🤔(Seonho communicating with fans in the nature)
vlive.english: It was just an example... For me to do it...

vlive.korean: 같은 방인 연정이와 다영이가 그렇~게 좋아하더라고요. my roommates YeonJung and Dayoung really enjoy it. 듣기 View video V PICK! : [WJSN] 봄과 어울리는 🌸청순한 봄연정🌸 (YeonJung's V in spring!)
vlive.english: my roommates YeonJung and Dayoung really enjoy it.

vlive.korean: [그.렇.다.면!] 그러면 이 식초를 나누도록 하겠습니다. [Then!] We'll just split up the vinegar. 듣기 View video V WEB DRAMA : [캐남] 그냥 자면 섭하지~_10회
vlive.english: [Then!] We'll just split up the vinegar.

vlive.korean: 이게 자기 손에 익은 그렇 것들이 따로 있는 거 같아요. I think people have different preferences in curlers. 듣기 View video V Beauty : [밤비걸] 요즘 핫한 회오리&버블컬 고데기 리뷰 Hair Iron Review
vlive.english: I think people have different preferences in curlers.

examples.korean: So what will officials do after tropical storm Wilma develops? Simple they go to the Greek Alphabet. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그렇 다면 관계자들은 열대성 폭풍우 윌마가 형성되면 어떻게 할까? 그저 그리스 알파배트로 넘어간다. Neungyule
examples.english: So what will officials do after tropical storm Wilma develops? Simple they go to the Greek Alphabet. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: So he knew where to hurt you, is that it? 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그럼 댁이 어디가 아픈지 그분이 알고 있는거군요, 그렇 습니까? User translation Inaccurate information may be included due to the users' self-traslation. 닫기 탑탱(kims****)

examples.korean: You think they gonna do that? 듣기 Add to Wordbook 너는 그들이 그렇에 할거라고 생각하니? User translation Inaccurate information may be included due to the users' self-traslation. 닫기 전채윤(emil****)

examples.korean: Am I one of the lefties? Possibly. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 제가 왼손잡이냐구요? 그렇수도 있죠. User translation Inaccurate information may be included due to the users' self-traslation. 닫기 syrentakj(syre****)
